subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Weather
Snow and Snowstorms
lead_paragraph: More than 1,200 people have been working in round-the-clock shifts the last few days, largely removing snow from the Alpine ski courses so ideal event conditions can be prepared.
snippet: More than 1,200 people have been working in round-the-clock shifts the last few days, largely removing snow from the Alpine ski courses so ideal event conditions can be prepared.
